# accessories

**Instance Property**

An array of previously-selected accessories for this application.

## Declaration

```swift
var accessories: [ASAccessory] { get }
```

## Discussion

To monitor for changes in this list, use your event handler to watch for the events [doc://com.apple.AccessorySetupKit/documentation/AccessorySetupKit/ASAccessoryEventType/accessoryAdded], [doc://com.apple.AccessorySetupKit/documentation/AccessorySetupKit/ASAccessoryEventType/accessoryChanged], and [doc://com.apple.AccessorySetupKit/documentation/AccessorySetupKit/ASAccessoryEventType/accessoryRemoved].
title: accessories
